Forget hours spent drafting and editing copy. With Wrighty, just a few clicks auto-generate clear, compelling text that resonates with your target audience. plugins.name: Fixiq — Fix the scale of working area
plugins.description:
Intro

In Figma, the current scale is not shown anywhere on the canvas. You can’t see how far you have moved from the actual scale of the frame. You can only select the frame and see its dimensions. And then estimate the ratio of pixels to percentages.


In Figma, you can zoom in to 100% once using hotkeys. But any movement on the board can lead to an accidental change in scale.


Solution

Fixiq not only fixes the 100% scale, but can also change it to 50%, 100%, 200%.


Plugin will be useful not only for designers, but also for managers. With Fixiq you can easily design interfaces of non-standard sizes/proportions and be sure about the scale you're working with. Your layouts will always be in the actual/original size. Managers can present project results to clients without irritating zooming.

accepted.name: Roman Nebel
accepted.description: IT Manager / UX Expert / Pet-projects Developer

plugins.tagline: Figma plugin that fixes the scale of working area

plugins.name: Lexi: Localize & Translate your design
plugins.description:
Design once—translate instantly. Lexi automates text translation in your Figma frames while keeping your layout intact. Perfect for multilingual apps, marketing assets, and App/Play Store screenshots.


🚀 Why Lexi?

50+ languages – Translate your designs into multiple languages in seconds.

Batch translation – Select multiple frames & languages at once.

Seamless workflow – Translated frames stay organized with clear naming.



🔧 How It Works

Select your frames – Pick the designs you need to translate.

Choose your languages – Supports all major languages, including English, Spanish, Japanese, Arabic, and more.

Translate with AI – Lexi uses OpenAI’s GPT-3.5 Turbo for high-quality, natural translations.

Get organized output – New frames are created, named with language codes, and maintain the original design structure.


🔒 Best Practices

Font compatibility – If a language isn't displaying correctly, try swapping fonts to Roboto or Inter for best results.


Who is Lexi for?

🌎 Designers working on global products.

📱 Teams creating multi-language UI/UX designs.

📢 Marketers adapting assets for international campaigns.

🏢 Agencies handling multilingual clients.


Credits:

Some of the designs featured in this plugin are from @ramsriperambudr. Thanks for the amazing work! 🙌


Ready to make your designs multilingual? Start localizing with Lexi today! 🚀
plugins.tagline: Translate all text in selected frames—perfect for multilingual apps & App/Play Store assets.

plugins.description:
不用创建组件，快速保存和复用设计资源。

你可以

  1. 保存最近常用的图标、组件、图片等所有设计
  2. 快速创建克隆
  3. 在单独的页面快速备份设计稿，保持页面整洁
  4. 当作有历史记录的剪贴板使用

---

注意：

  1. 本插件仅记录元素的id信息用于检索，不存储实际设计内容
  2. 本地存储，不支持跨设备跨浏览器
  3. 不支持跨文件调用设计内容

---

Quickly save and reuse design resources without creating components.


You can:

  1. Save frequently used icons, components, images, and all design elements.
  2. Quickly create clones.
  3. Backup design drafts on a separate page to keep your workspace organized.
  4. Use it as a clipboard with history.


Note:

  1. This plugin only records the ID information of elements for retrieval and does not store actual design content.
  2. It uses local storage and does not support cross-device or cross-browser functionality.
  3. It also does not support calling design content across different files.

---

plugins.name: Corners Alignment
plugins.description:

1. 多矩形圆角对齐

选中多个矩形时：

▸ 自动取最大矩形为基准

▸ Takes largest rectangle as reference

▸ Syncs smaller rectangles' corners for visual equidistance

▸ Uses min-spacing calculation for non-proportional alignment


2. Container Element Alignment

On selecting Frame/Component/Instance:

▸ Identifies as container

▸ Adjusts corners of all top-level child elements

plugins.name: BlendAI
plugins.description:
BlendAI seamlessly integrates with Figma to let you generate high-quality images from text prompts or combine up to three reference images in a single click. It’s perfect for product mockups, hero banners, packshots, concept art, backgrounds, or quick visual inspiration—without ever leaving your Figma file.


Key Features:

• Simple prompt → image

Type a natural-language description and instantly receive a crisp, AI-rendered result.

• Multi-reference blending

Upload up to three reference images (for example: a product shot, a texture, and a background) and instruct BlendAI to place, style, or combine them.

Example: “Place @IMG_1 in front of @IMG_2 with the lighting mood of @IMG_3.”

• Six aspect-ratio presets

1:1 (Square), 16:9 (Landscape), 9:16 (Portrait), 4:3 (Classic), 3:4 (Portrait), 21:9 (Ultrawide)

• Instant one-click generation

No manual exports or workarounds—everything happens directly in Figma’s interface.

• Credit-based system

Includes a free 10-image starter pack. Easily top up credits from the “Get More” menu.

• History & quick re-use

View, revisit, and re-generate past images directly within the plugin.


BlendAI was built for designers who need on-the-fly visuals—whether it’s a quick hero image for a mockup, a polished packshot for a product page, or a fully blended scene combining multiple photo references. Try it free, then unlock larger credit packs for heavy usage.
plugins.tagline: AI image generation & multi-reference blending inside Figma for hero banners, mockups or backgrounds

plugins.name: DeepL Translator
plugins.description:
DeepL Translator


A Figma plugin that quickly translates text within frames using the DeepL API.

The acceleration feature enables faster translations and cost savings.


Features


  1. 🚀 Fast Translation: Re-use past translation history for fast fast translation
  2. 💰️ Cost Saving: Save API Usage by Re-use past translation history
  3. 🌐 Multi-language Support: Supports 29 languages
  4. 📚 Glossary Support: Use DeepL glossaries for consistent translations
  5. 🌍 Auto Detection: Automatic source language detection
  6. 📝 Non-destructive: Creates new frames for translations while preserving originals
  7. 🎯 Simple Operation: Just select languages and click translate


How to Use


  1. Get a DeepL API key (see below)
  2. Select a frame containing text to translate
  3. Choose source and target languages
  4. (Optional) Select a glossary
  5. Click "Translate"
  6. Translation results appear in a new frame


Getting a DeepL API Key

plugins.name: SVG Exporter
plugins.description:
Este plugin te permite exportar elementos gráficos (assets) en formato SVG desde cualquier Frame que selecciones en Figma. Al ejecutarlo:

1. El plugin detecta automáticamente los vectores, íconos y componentes dentro del frame seleccionado.

2. Muestra una lista con vista previa de cada asset, su nombre y tipo (VECTOR, LINE, COMPONENT, etc.).

3. Puedes filtrar por tipo, seleccionar o deseleccionar assets individualmente o todos a la vez.

4. Al hacer clic en “Exportar selección”, los archivos se descargan en un ZIP listo para usar.


Uso paso a paso:

• Selecciona un Frame que contenga los assets que deseas exportar.

• Ejecuta el plugin.

• Filtra, selecciona y exporta.


Limitaciones actuales:

• Solo funciona si seleccionas un Frame (no soporta múltiples frames a la vez).

• Solo exporta elementos compatibles con formato SVG.

• No incluye imágenes rasterizadas, texto plano ni auto layout como exportables.

• No detecta automáticamente cambios de selección; requiere usar el botón “Actualizar selección”.



-----------------------------------------


This plugin lets you export graphical elements (assets) as SVG files from any selected Frame in Figma.


When you run the plugin:

1. It scans the selected frame for valid exportable elements (e.g., VECTORS, ICONS, COMPONENTS).

2. You’ll see a list of assets with preview thumbnails, names, and their Figma types.

3. You can filter by type, toggle selection, and bulk-select assets.

4. Clicking “Export Selection” downloads all selected assets as a clean ZIP file of SVGs.


How to use it:

• Select a Frame that contains the assets you want to export.

• Launch the plugin.

• Use the filters, select assets, and export.


Current limitations:

• Only one Frame can be selected at a time.

• Only elements that support SVG export will be included (e.g., no bitmaps or text layers).

• Does not automatically react to new selections — use the “Refresh Selection” button manually when needed.
plugins.tagline: Exporta fácilmente assets SVG desde frames seleccionados en Figma, con vista previa y filtros.

plugins.name: Heurator
plugins.description:
Elevate your design critique process with Heurator, a powerful Figma plugin that brings Nielsen's 10 Usability Heuristics directly into your workflow.


Document, visualize, and solve usability issues with precision—all without leaving your design files.


✓ Pinpoint violations with customizable severity ratings

✓ Generate visually striking evaluation cards linked to problem areas

✓ Create actionable recommendations to improve user experience

✓ Maintain consistent evaluation criteria across your team


Even in the age of AI-generated interfaces, human-centered heuristic evaluation remains essential. While AI excels at creating visually appealing designs, it often misses nuanced usability concerns that experienced designers catch. Heurator bridges this gap by helping you apply proven principles to any interface—whether human or AI-designed—ensuring truly intuitive experiences.


Transform complex usability principles into practical insights and deliver more thoughtful, user-centered designs with Heurator.
plugins.tagline: Because Even AI-Generated UIs Need Human-Centered Evaluation

plugins.name: Spacing and radius fixer
plugins.description:
Auto-fix spacing & radius

Plugin that automatically rounds spacing and radius values to the nearest preset value in Auto Layout objects.


What it does

- Rounds gap and padding values to the nearest preset spacing

- Rounds corner radius to the nearest preset radius

- Works with any Auto Layout object (frames, components, instances)


Presets

Default values (can be customized in plugin):

Spacing: 0, 2, 4, 6, 8, 10, 12, 16, 20, 24, 32, 40, 48, 56, 64, 80 (px)

Radius: 0, 2, 4, 6, 8, 10, 12, 16, 20, 100 (px)


How to use

1. Select Auto Layout object(s)

2. Run the plugin

3. Switch between Spacing/Radius modes

4. Customize presets if needed (or use Reset to restore defaults)

5. Click Apply
plugins.tagline: Fixes inconsistent spacing and radius values by rounding them to the nearest preset

plugins.name: FigCrawl
plugins.description:
FigCrawl: Your FigJam Content Extractor


What is FigCrawl?

FigCrawl is a powerful FigJam plugin that transforms your collaborative boards into structured, AI-ready data. It intelligently extracts and organizes all your board's content while preserving the visual hierarchy and relationships between elements.


Use Cases

For Designers & Teams

  1. Extract structured content from brainstorming sessions
  2. Convert visual collaboration into actionable data
  3. Document and archive board content
  4. Share board content in a structured format


For AI/LLM Integration

  1. Feed board content into AI tools
  2. Generate summaries and reports
  3. Analyze relationships between ideas
  4. Create structured documentation


For Documentation

  1. Export board content for documentation
  2. Create structured reports
  3. Archive important board sessions
  4. Share insights with stakeholders



How It Works

  1. Launch: Open the plugin in your FigJam board
  2. Extract: Click "Extract Content" to scan your board
  3. Review: See a summary of extracted content
  4. Copy: Choose to copy the entire board or individual pages
  5. Use: Paste the JSON into your preferred AI tool or LLM
plugins.tagline: Extract FigJam content into AI-ready data with one click

plugins.name: Lumos Design Toolkit
plugins.description:
Lumos Design Toolkit is a powerful Figma plugin that streamlines your design workflow by providing essential tools for managing design systems, variables, text styles, and file organization. It helps designers maintain consistency, save time, and improve collaboration across design projects.


✨ Key Features


🎨 Variables Management

•Import from JSON – Bring your design tokens into Figma with just a few clicks

•Light & Dark Mode Support – Import variables for multiple modes effortlessly

•Smart Conflict Handling – Choose to overwrite, skip, or rename existing variables

•Organize with Collections – Group and manage your variables into clean collections


📝 Text Styles

•Create Custom Styles – Define fonts, sizes, weights, and line heights that match your system

•Apply in One Click – Select a text layer and apply styles instantly

•Live Preview – See exactly how your styles will look before creating

•Full Style Control – View, apply, or delete styles from a single interface


📄 Page Management

•Quick Page Creation – Add new pages without the manual setup

•Batch Mode – Create multiple pages at once by listing names line-by-line

•Organize with Ease – Rename, reorder, and delete pages from one place


🚀 Starter Templates

•Working File Structure – Automatically generate pages like Cover, Research, Drafts, and Final Designs

•Design System Setup – Instantly build a system with pages for Typography, Colors, Components, Layouts, Templates, and Docs

plugins.name: Private Notes
plugins.description:
Private Notes allows you to attach personal annotations to any layer in your Figma file that remain completely private to you.


  1. Truly Private: Notes are stored locally and their contents are only visible to you, never to other collaborators
  2. Visual Markers: Customisable markers show where you've left notes (only visible when you run the plugin)
  3. Flexible Positioning: Place note markers in 8 different positions around your layers that stay fixed to the right frame.
  4. Persistent Storage: Your notes remain attached to layers even when you close and reopen Figma


Perfect for designers who want to keep track of personal thoughts, reminders, and to-dos without cluttering the file with comments visible to everyone.


Use it for recording client feedback, noting implementation details, or leaving yourself breadcrumbs for areas that need further attention.


Please contact me for any feedback. suggestions or issues!
plugins.tagline: Keep your thoughts private- annotations only you can see.

plugins.name: Zuuvi Export Service
plugins.description:
Zuuvi Export Service is a Figma plugin designed to integrate Figma with Zuuvi’s Studio platform, making it easier and more efficient for designers who work with both tools. The plugin helps reduce the need to manually recreate designs in Studio after first mocking them up in Figma. While built around Figma’s capabilities, the exported result aims to reflect the original design as closely as possible within the constraints of Studio’s features.


Easily export ad creatives from Figma directly into your Zuuvi workspace - ready for production, personalisation, and cross-channel publishing.

Whether you're designing HTML5 banners, social media ads, retail media formats or in-store screens, this plugin helps creative teams move faster and stay in control.


🔧 What You Can Do with the Zuuvi Plugin:

  1. Export static or layered ad designs directly from Figma to Zuuvi
  2. Optimise for use across display, social, retail media, DOOH, video, and more
  3. Support for production-ready HTML5 ad creatives
  4. Maintain template structure and layer control for streamlined animation workflows


🚀 Why Use Zuuvi for Your Ad Production?

Zuuvi is a Creative Performance Platform that empowers marketers and designers to:


  1. Build high-quality, high-performing HTML5 ads at speed
  2. Personalise and localise creatives across channels and markets
  3. Scale ad production without adding design overhead
  4. Centralise all ad formats - from social media creatives to dynamic banners - in one platform


📚 Documentation & Support

Full plugin guide and step-by-step tutorials: https://help.zuuvi.com/en/articles/10774913-how-to-export-from-figma-to-zuuvi-studio


Questions? Reach out anytime via our live chat or care@zuuvi.com


🧩 Requirements

To use this plugin, an active Zuuvi account is required.

Not a user yet? Learn more and book a demo here.


🔒 Data Security

We value your creative integrity and your data privacy. Zuuvi follows best practices for security, and all plugin exports are processed securely through your Zuuvi account.


Design in Figma. Scale in Zuuvi.

From idea to high-performing ad campaign – Zuuvi makes creative production fast, scalable, and impactful.
plugins.tagline: Convert your Figma designs to omnichannel ad campaigns

plugins.name: 切图尺寸整合 Image Size Integration
plugins.description:
介绍

切图尺寸整合插件让 Figma 用户能够高效地管理和整合图像，适用于框架、组、组件等设计元素。通过该插件，您可以调整图像大小，并应用统一的尺寸以确保设计的一致性。


功能说明

  1. 允许用户选择多个元素（框架、组、组件、文本、实例等）。
  2. 自动计算所选元素的最大宽度和最大高度。
  3. 在预览框内显示每个选定的图像，用户可以选择保持原始尺寸或根据最长边进行缩放。
  4. 开关功能：切换保持图像原始尺寸或根据预览框大小调整图像。
  5. 提供灵活的控制选项，用于调整图像在预览框中的显示方式。


使用方法

  1. 选择您想要预览和调整的元素（框架、组、文本、组件、实例等）。
  2. 点击“生成Base64预览图”按钮以生成图像预览。
  3. 使用开关切换，选择是保持图像原始尺寸还是根据预览框尺寸进行缩放。
  4. 在插件界面直接查看调整后的图像及其对应尺寸。


注意事项

  1. 本插件支持栅格图像和矢量元素。
  2. 图像将显示在固定大小的预览框内，缩放设置会根据您的开关选择进行应用。
  3. 插件操作依赖于 Figma 画布上的选中元素，请确保在使用插件前选中正确的元素。


Introduction

Image Size Integration allows Figma users to efficiently manage and integrate images within frames, groups, and components. With this plugin, you can adjust image sizes and apply uniform dimensions for a consistent design output.


Function Description

  1. Allows users to select multiple elements (Frames, Groups, Components, Text, Instances, etc.) in a Figma design.
  2. Automatically calculates the maximum width and height from the selected elements.
  3. Displays each selected image inside a preview box, either maintaining its original size or resizing it based on the longest side, as determined by the user's settings.
  4. A toggle feature to switch between maintaining the image's original size or scaling it to fit the preview box.
  5. Supports flexible control over how images are displayed within their allocated preview space.


How to Use

  1. Select the elements (Frames, Groups, Text, Components, Instances, etc.) you want to preview and adjust.
  2. Click the "Generate Base64 Preview" button to create image previews.
  3. Use the toggle to switch between keeping the image’s original size or scaling it to fit the preview box.
  4. View the adjusted images and their corresponding dimensions directly within the plugin's interface.


Notes

  1. The plugin supports both raster images and vector elements.
  2. Images will be displayed in a fixed-size preview box, and resizing settings apply based on your toggle choice.
  3. The plugin works with selected elements in Figma's canvas, so ensure you have the right items selected before applying the tool.

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: If you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to contact me at kingweichueng@qq.com.

plugins.tagline: Easily integrate and adjust image sizes for frames.

plugins.name: BableBox
plugins.description:
BableBox is a Figma plugin designed to make translating your interfaces a breeze. With a single click, it converts your entire design from one language to another, preserving context to ensure accurate, natural translations.


Say goodbye to the hassle of translating hundreds of words and phrases manually! BableBox leverages GPT-4o mini, one of the best AI models, which understands the context of each text to avoid errors (it intelligently skips icons and symbols like FontAwesome, for instance).


This plugin is perfect for designers and global teams looking for a fast, reliable, and easy solution to translate projects while maintaining content coherence and quality.


In short: a one-click translation tool built to save you time and reduce errors. 🌍🚀
plugins.tagline: BableBox: Translate your designs in one click, with perfect context 🌍

plugins.name: JSONify
plugins.description:
Export Text Layers as JSON


JSONify simplifies your workflow by automatically converting selected text layers into structured JSON data.


In JSONify, each Figma layer’s name becomes a key in the exported JSON, and the text content within the layer becomes its corresponding value.


For example, a layer named "title" containing the text "Hello World!" would generate the following JSON entry:

"title": "Hello World! (classic 😉)"


This straightforward mapping keeps your exported JSON organized, clean, and easy to integrate - directly reflecting the structure of your design.


How the Plugin Works


  1. Layer names = Object keys: Each layer name becomes a key in the exported JSON object.
  2. Line breaks = Array items: Text containing line breaks (\n) is split into an array of strings.
  3. Groups = Arrays: Grouped text layers are exported as array items under the group's name.
  4. Prefix “exclude-” to skip: Any layer whose name starts with exclude- will be excluded from the export.


🖤 Open-source & community-driven! Check out the code or contribute: https://github.com/ko-ko-lo/figma-json-export


💬 Feedback, ideas, or just want to say hi? Drop a comment - I’d love to hear from you!

accepted.name: Denise Kolodzey
accepted.description:

I’m a UX Engineer with a love for thoughtful tools and beautiful details.
I build Figma plugins that make workflows smoother and design more fun.

plugins.name: One Click Export
plugins.description:
📌 ストーリー

フレームを指定してエクスポートをするときに、意図しない下の階層でエクスポートがされて悲しんでいる方々をたくさん見てきました。

そこで！少しでも役に立てればと思いプラグインを作っちゃいました！


このプラグインなら、セクションをクリックするだけで、その直下にあるフレームをボタンひとつで "カンタン" にエクスポートできちゃいます。

これで間違った階層でのエクスポートミスも防げるようになりました！

やったね🙌


📝 使い方

  1. プラグインを起動する
  2. セクションをクリックする
  3. セクション上にあるフレームがリストで表示されるので、順番にエクスポートのボタンをクリックする


⭐️ 今後のアップデート予定

  1. イケてるUIにする
  2. セクション上にあるフレームをまとめてエクスポートできるようにする
plugins.tagline: セクション直下にあるフレームをカンタンにエクスポートできる

plugins.name: Juxync
plugins.description:
Want to get alpha access to Jux? Visit jux.io


Jux is a code-based canvas design tool that plugs right into developer's codebase, enabling product designers to design the UI itself and developers its logic.

Creating a good color tokens system is a complex task. Use Juxync to import your variables to Jux to use as design tokens. Juxync will convert your variables collections, groups and modes into token sets to use in Jux. It will maintain all the relationships between variables.


How does Juxync work?

For more visual ‘how does it work‘, visit the knowledge base

  1. It scans Figma color variables in your chosen file.
  2. The plugin auto maps the tokens into core, and other semantics sets.
  3. Sync the tokens into the Jux token management, allowing developers to view and use these tokens via our CLI.


Next up: (or Future features)

  1. Sync Assets (SVG)
  2. Dimensions tokens
  3. Typography styles
  4. Check out the roadmap for more information


Want to be among the first to join the alpha? Join our community

accepted.name: Jux
accepted.description: We’re building a code-based design tool so designers can design the actual, real product as it will be used in production.

plugins.tagline: Juxync imports your Figma Variables as design tokens to Jux, seamlessly.

plugins.name: FontFig
plugins.description:
🤔 How it works:


  1. 1. Choose a font. This will be your base font - it can either be a font you want to manipulate or just help you get a good foundation for the different characters
  2. 2. Import the font. Fontfig will generate an artboard for every character and convert every character into an SVG.
  3. 3. Get creative. Manipulate or create totally new characters.
  4. 4. Export your new font (Whoop)


👉 Pointers:


  1. 📄 One Font can be created / edited per page
  2. 💾 Export each font up to 5 times for one price.
  3. 📐 Adjust the width of the artboard to change letter spacing for each character
  4. 💪 Support for more complex fonts coming soon


💬 We need your feedback:


  1. Drop us a comment or message if you see anything you think could be better. We want to continually improve this Plugin so your feedback is super helpful!
plugins.tagline: Create your own fonts in Figma
